svt_i2c_slave_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_i2c_slave_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The coverage data callback class defines default data and event information that are used to implement the coverage groups. The coverage data callback class is extended from callback class svt_i2c_slave_monitor_callback . This class itself does not contain any cover groups.
